item.title: Allstate CEO Tom Wilson strikes the wrong tone
item.description: Also: Carvana stock slides on short report, Former TGI Fridays CEO returns, AI social media backfires for Meta.

item.title: EV sales reached UK record in 2024, but came at a ‘huge cost’ and are ‘unsustainable’ industry warns
item.description: Automakers were forced to dish out EV incentives to hit UK government-mandated sales targets, a situation that will get "even more intense" in 2025.

item.title: Kamala Harris will preside over the certification of her own loss when Congress certify’s Donald Trump’s Electoral College victory on Jan. 6
item.description: Trump is returning to office after winning the 2024 election that began with Biden as his party's nominee and ended with Vice President Kamala Harris ...

item.title: Renewables set to dominate as UK and Germany hit a clean energy high in 2024
item.description: Renewable energy like wind and solar accounted for 59% of production in Germany last year, while in Britain it stood at 45%.

item.title: Schools and government offices in several states across the U.S. closed due to winter blast of snow and ice
item.description: The National Weather Service issued winter storm warnings from Kansas and Missouri all the way to New Jersey.
